items.name: Veggie Burger
items.description: A juicy veggie patty served on a whole grain bun with lettuce, tomato, and a tangy sauce.

items.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
items.description: Al dente spaghetti with a creamy sauce made from egg yolk, pecorino cheese, pancetta, and pepper.

items.name: Mac & Cheese
items.description: Creamy cheddar cheese mixed with perfectly cooked macaroni, topped with crispy breadcrumbs. A classic comfort food.

items.name: Veggie Burger
items.description: A juicy veggie patty served on a whole grain bun with lettuce, tomato, and a tangy sauce.

items.name: Falafel Wrap
items.description: Crispy falafels wrapped in a warm pita with lettuce, tomatoes, and a tahini sauce.

items.name: Pancake Stack
items.description: Fluffy pancakes stacked high, drizzled with maple syrup and topped with fresh berries.

items.name: Chocolate Brownie
items.description: A rich and fudgy brownie, topped with a scoop of vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce.
